1.content: Thank you for joining Super Smash : Possession Tale! First off, You'll need to choose your Gender. So.. What'll it be?
1.title: Title Screen

11.content:
Alright Male. Now, I must tell you about your powers. You have the ability to, Possess people, Male and Female alike. You also have the ability to Morph people's appearances, whether it be their hair color or their Gender. You've had this power for years, so you don't have to post about discovery of the power! Now that that's out of the way... I'll put you into your story... have a nice day! Signed, Lady Lita.

Jumping up in a cold sweat, you look around you. Surveying the area, you calm down, remembering where you were. Whatever dream you just had... it was insane... Talking about Powers and Possession. It was weird, almost like some random chick was explaining your powers to you.. Standing up, you dust yourself off and grin. Today was your first day, in this new town and it was gonna be fun messing with the people around this place.

But first.. where are you right now?
11.title: Male

choices: Go back to Pikachu and Pichu's place and possess one of them
111.content:
You get up and get ready for the day, luckily it is a weekend, so you don't have to go to school today, and your parents are out as well. You decide to use your powers to possess a girl. You go and become a spirit for as you fly around town, looking for a girl to become. You go into a house and see a beautiful girl with long, gold hair and pointy ears (Pikachu) currently sleeping in her bed, and after searching through the house, you see a cute girl with a small chest who is obviously her younger sister by a few years (Pichu) who is awake and going down the stairs to go outside and play, she is wearing a yellow shirt and a black skirt with yellow shorts underneath.

'I'd love to become one of them.' You think. 'but I might be caught by the other one for not acting like the one I possess.' With that thought in mind you you move on. The next house you come to has a beautiful blue haired girl, who you met yesterday as you were finishing up moving in, who told you her name is Krystal, she is the girlfriend of Fox, who is the local track team star, she is currently putting on a blue jumpsuit, and she has a staff on a shelf. You consider possessing her as well, but maybe you should possess someone else.
111.title: In your Bedroom.

1111.content:
You decide to backtrack to Pikachu and Pichu's house. You look inside of Pikachu's room to see that she's just waking up, and about to start getting dressed, while Pichu is getting on her bike in order to go to a basketball court to play.

'Hm... Who should I possess?' You wonder. 'Pichu's cute and seems to be a tomboy and Pikachu is outright beautiful. This is a tough decision.' You think, but then you get an idea. 'Maybe I could try to possess both at once!'
1111.title: Go back to Pikachu and Pichu's place

choices: Continue what they had been doing before being possessed
You go to Pichu's room as her, and explore both bodies in front of mirrors
11113.content:
'Yeah, let's try that.' You think as you focus, and you manage to split yourself in two. Both parts of you, which are somehow exactly like you originally were in every way, including size (even though if you think about it, you should be only half your normal size), smile at each other and take different paths. Pichu has her bike out and is about to get on it when part of you flies into her. She only has time to gasp before losing all awareness. Her eyes are blank for a moment you take control and emotion comes back to them. When you do, you look down at your new body and smirk.

Meanwhile, Pikachu has opened her wardrobe and is looking for what to wear when you float down right behind her, you step into her body. She gasps and shivers before her body freezes up as you begin to take control. Like Pichu, her eyes go blank, then emotion comes back to them as you take full control. As Pikachu, you look down at her breasts and smile, grabbing them and squeezing them, causing that body to moan in pleasure.
11113.title: Both at once

choices: You're already at the basket ball court, so go play
You're too rattled by what Mewtwo said to concentrate, go to Pichu's house
111131.content:
You decide to do what they had been doing before hand, so as Pichu, you go and get on her bike and heading to the basket ball court. You have never been good at bike riding, so you enjoy the fact that you can use the abilities and skills of those you have possessed, grinning all of the way.

Meanwhile, as Pikachu, you begin getting dressed, you used her memories and knowledge to get her bra on, and continued from there, every so often squeezing Pikachu's breasts, or something similar. You see a black and gold form fitting dress in her wardrobe and get it out. Within moments you have put it on.

"Well, well, this is quite the adorable body." You say as Pikachu as you twirl around once and squeeze her breasts again. "In all seriousness though, that's enough of that for now, time to continue on." You then begin doing all of Pikachu's morning routines as her.

Meanwhile as Pichu, you continue on and make it to the basket ball court and begin to put your bike up when you see a guy with short white hair and a toned build nearby looking at you. From Pichu and Pikachu's memories, you find that he is Mewtwo a Senior at your school, and he’s also managed to become the School Psychiatrist/ Guidance Counselor.

"Hello." You greet him. Mewtwo nods to you.

"I see you've been settling in quite nicely, in more ways than one." He replies.

"What?" You ask him in shock.

"I know you're not who you pretend to be." Mewtwo replies. "I've developed my psychic powers far beyond what anyone should be able to be able to. I knew of your powers the moment you moved in." You gulp.

"So what are you going to do?" You ask him in fear, worried that he'd rat you out.

"Nothing really, I'm just mentioning that I know." Mewtwo replies. "Well, see you around, Nathan."

"What? My name's not Nathan, you should know that!" You reply.

"Yes, yes, I know." Mewtwo replies. "It's just a reference to a joke used in another universe. Goodbye, Anthony." With that, he teleports away in a flash.

"That was interesting..." You say in shock. 'But what did he mean by a joke used in another universe?'

What do you do as Pichu next?
111131.title: Continue what they had been doing

1112.content: How will you possess her?
1112.title: Possess Krystal

choices: fox breaks in and stops them
fox and zelda run away (zelda investigates as sheik)
11123.content: you wait for school to start because you will need a lot of rest to do what you are going to do next. you say to the teacher that you are feeling sick and dont think you should go to school. first you posses krystal and give fox a note to meet her near the boys locker room afterschool. then you do the same thing with zelda and give link a note to come at the same place and time. now comes the hard part. you possess crystal and link at the same time and go over there. once you make shure zelda and fox are both coming you start to have the possessed krystal and link make out while zelda and fox were watching.
11123.title: wait until shool starts

choices: Go into Zelda and Tetra's place
1113.content:
You decide that you want to put off on possessing them for now, so you begin looking for others to possess. You fly around town some more and come to some more houses, one is the home of a girl with brown hair in an unusual style and brown eyes, wearing a green shirt, white skirt, black socks, and pink sneakers (Latias. I'm using her Bianca form because of how often she takes that form in the anime). She looks really depressed, suddenly, you hear he speak.

"Big brother, why did you have to die..." She said depressed, and you remembered hearing from Krystal about a girl whose brother died not that long ago protecting her. You search around some more and find another house that has two sisters living in it, one is a girl wearing a long flowing dress, and who has silky blonde hair and eyes that seem to be able to pierce a person's soul (Zelda). In another room, you see a shorter girl with blond hair that curves up in a spiral, with oddly solid blue eyes, and tanned skin. She is wearing a white, sleeveless shirt with a blue sleeveless vest over it, white pants/shorts with thin, purple circles close to the bottom, a red band around her waist, a red scarf, brown sandles, and white bandage wrappings around her wrists who all in all looks like a tomboy (Tetra).

You consider possessing one of them.
1113.title: Search around some more

choices: You accidentally collide with the female character (I intend to add to this one)
11133.content:
You decide to continue on in search of someone else, leaving those girls as possibilities for later, and you fly off towards another house.

Choice 1: You accidentally collide with a girl who has similar powers to your own (female character) and switch bodies with her.

Choice 2: You arrive at another house.
11133.title: keep searching

1113322.content: Who is it you see at his house?
1113322.title: Wolf's house

11133222.content: Really? Well arn't you picky...
11133222.title: other

12.content:
Alright Female. Now, I must tell you about your powers. You have the ability to, Possess people, Male and Female alike. You also have the ability to Morph people's appearances, whether it be their hair color or their Gender. You've had this power for years, so you don't have to post about discovery of the power! Now that that's out of the way... I'll put you into your story... have a nice day! Signed, Lady Lita. Oh P.S... in this story... you'll be playing a different character. Pretty much the same Personality as the Male character but a bit more cynical and willing to hurt people.

Jumping up in a cold sweat, you look around you. Surveying the area, you calm down, remembering where you were. Whatever dream you just had... it was insane... Talking about Powers and Possession. It was weird, remembering the day you received your powers.. although you were narrating it yourself. With a smile on your face you grin and stretch, ready to start a brand new day.

But first.. where are you right now?
12.title: Female

choices: Retribution for viewing the goods without paying.
What's this! A Newcomer Approaches... again?
121.content:
Pushing the covers off of your body, you swing your legs off the bed and stretch. Stepping off the bed, you walk towards the window and pull back the blinds revealing a bright and radiant day, filled with the promise of Love and Life. Yea... if only it were that boring. The day revealed people to be fucked with and fun to have, in a brand new town, your record was at zero and it was gonna be awesome. Walking into your bathroom, you hear your mother yelling from downstairs... Reina Rhodes, a 39 year old single mother, she used to love to party and got knocked up by some random stranger at a bar she was 21 years old. You were the outcome. She has long black hair that reaches the small of her back. With 34-25-36 measurements, she attracts guys left and right hell in the right situation she attracts chicks. She knows about your powers, but she doesn't care, she figures you'll grow out of the destructive tendencies.

She was yelling at you to do something... you couldn't hear her.. you didn't exactly care either, whatever it was she'd tell you when you went downstairs. Disrobing you step into the shower and turn on the water. Feels good to wash off the memory of all the old sins and welcome in the new. As you reach for some shampoo you hear a Bang! as the bathroom door is ripped open, by some figure. Turning towards the door, you grab the shampoo bottle in defense. The figure advanced towards you arms hovering at it's sides. It damn near lunged for the shower door and slid it backwards, before a high pitched scream pierced the air. You fell down, shielding your breasts and legs, from the assailant wondering how this happened. The figure jumped backwards and turned on the light. Filling the room with bright light.

"Oh my god, I had no idea you were taking a shower in there... although I guess it makes sense.. seeing as the water was running.. Oh let me introduce myself I'm Peach  ! She took a few steps back and put her hands in her hair, pushing it upwards. "Why are you sitting like that? Oh my... did you think I was going to hurt you? She laughed and reached a hand down to help you up. Reaching up a bit wearily, you grab her hand and stand up, letting your hands drop to the side. She took a few steps back and gasped a bit audibly. "Wow! You look so pretty! Are you like... a model or something... wait no.. I guess not.. since you're in school with me. Heehee."

"Yea.. um. Peach? Could you.. hand me a towel? They're on that rack... over there, thanks." You snatch the towel from her and wrap it around your body, slowly calming down. You had some questions though, but than again... this girl did interrupt you in the shower, and since she saw you naked.. she had an obligation to fulfill. Looking at her as she turned around to view your bathroom, you glance down at her booty shorts and think for a hot second.
121.title: Your Room

1212.content:
Floating through the air you left Peach behind. She was having enough fun by herself. Making your way to the top of a tree you find yourself staring into Pokemon Park. Today was Park clean up day and the whole damn school was there. Pulling out the yearbook that peach lent you, you start flipping through the names and pictures and matching them to the faces in the crowd. Football teams, Cheerleaders, hipsters everyone in the world could be found there even the exchange students. Stepping down from the branches you landed behind the Principal's truck. Reaching into your pocket you called up Peach and let the phone ring for a couple minutes before she picked up.

~ 5 Minutes Earlier ~

Peach fell back on the bed, her head craned right to look at her clone. "I had no idea Rhodes could actually do that. It felt like she was inside of me!" The clone stepped forward and sat next to the prone Peach. "Thank god you're pretty peach.. it's your best quality." Peach lit up like a star and smiled. "Thanks, Clone! I am feeling extra pretty today. You know it's portion control and plenty of water... and Mario said it ha-mmm." The Clone swooped in on the pretty girl and locked lips with her. She moved her tongue with a skill Peach had never known and she made sure to keep Peach quiet long enough to warm her up. Pulling away from her original she took Peach's hand in her own and held it over her belt, hoping she'd take the hint and pull off her damn clothes.

"I'm going to call you Keen.. Clone. No not Keen Clone.. just Keen!" The newly dubbed Keen smiled and began unbuckling Peach's belt and slowly moved down to remove her skirt. "I love that name.. and I love you too." Keen moved Peach's skirt down to her ankles and moved in on the cute mushroom panties she had on. Peach just leaned back and rested her soft hands on Keen's blonde mane. "Ahh you suck at this Kee- Oh my god!" Keen tangled her fingers in Peach's slit and nipped at her stomach and then her 'lips' in response to the teasing. Pulling herself up she kissed Peach on her neck and smiled, enjoying the double dip of flavor. "Sorry, let me try harder." Keen wriggled against her, slipping a leg between Peach's. God, this was the best first birthday ever.

She pulled Peach's shirt off and brought her hands to Peach's bra. "Lets-a go." Unhooking the bra in a mere moment she crouched down on the bed and put her mouth around Peach's chest, using her free hand to keep Peach satisfied between her legs. Before peach could even reply to the stimulus her phone started going off. Groaning and with extreme dislike she got off the bed and dug through the pile of her clothes before pulling out the flower monogrammed cell phone. "Hello?"

~The Present! ~

"Peach! How are you. You sound out of breath.." You just laughed and held your head in your hands as the thoughts of Peach and her clone pleasuring each other into a tizzy reared it's head. "No Yeah have fun with what you're doing but I need to ask you a favor... let me borrow your form for a bit? I have some herps that need extreme derping." You listened to the intermittent slew of words, moans and laughter for a few seconds before your eyes lit up. "You're the best, Princess. Later." Closing the phone you let a wave of energy wash over your form replacing it with a Peach's. Fluffing up and moving some of your blonde hair out of your newly formed face, you strode into the park with a new confidence and a growing sense of excitement. Brand new town to enjoy... and oh my god some of these girls! Not a homely one in the bunch!

"Peach!" Jumping slightly at hearing your new name being called you turned towards the voice to find something interesting.
1212.title: Retribution for viewing the goods without paying.

info.brief_description: You have the ability to Possess/morph the appearance of anyone you sees even yourself.
info.description:
A Newcomer Approaches! But this Newcomer is different from the other Smash Participants. This Newcomer has the ability to morph the appearance of anyone he/she sees even him/herself. And as an added bonus the Newcomer can possess anyone. Let's see how things go in this Super Smash Town.

The Main character is tall, fair skinned and with short brown hair. In the town, the characters from all 3 games appear in their original costumes. There are no smash balls nor items but there is a school, where most of the characters go.

List of Chracters and Positions.

Bowser: Bully of the school, Red hair, usually wears green clothes. Into Piercing and hitting on Blondes. (Sophomore)

Captain Falcon: School Track Teacher, Same appearance minus the Helmet.

Diddy Kong: Short Hyperactive kid, 6th grader and a tech genius.

Donkey Kong: School Gym Teacher, big hairy guy, Meaty fists and a speech problem.

Dr. Mario: Doctor of the town, Short Brown hair.

Falco: Avian Team Captain. Short blue hair, happy personality. (Junior)

Fox: Local Track Team Star. Medium length Brown hair, serious personality. (Junior)

Ganondorf: Vice Principal of the School. Dark, and malicious personality, willing to expel anyone who gets in his way, Has a crush on the Junior Prom Queen.

Ice Climbers: Twins, nearly inseparable. Both usually wear matching clothes, and both rarely speak to anyone but each other.

Ike: Laid back guy. Extremely tough and very protective of his friends. Athletic build, Short blue hair and usually wears a red headband around his head. (Senior)

Jigglypuff: School's Self Proclaimed Pop Star. Singing is so melodious that it puts people to sleep. Although she doesn't get her effect on people, she has a short temper. Long pink hair, and a slightly chubby body. (Junior)

King Dedede: Bully in the school. Usually picks on the Freshman, using his strength and body weight to intimidate people. Wears a hat at all times, so no one can tell what hair color he has. Chubby build, and short arms. (Freshman)

Kirby: Mute, freshman in the school. Has the ability to mimic anyone to a fault, copying their stance, their style and their skills. Short, chubby build and has a weakness for food.

Krystal: Girlfriend to Fox. Co-Captain of the Gymnastics team and current intern to the schools psychiatrist due to her psychic abilities. Short blue hair, vixen qualities and a kind personality

Link: Junior Prom King of the school. Currently dating the Junior Prom Queen, He's the strong silent type and usually speaks in grunts and yells. Athletic build and long blonde hair. Is hated profusely by the Vice Principal.

Lucario: Taichi master of the school. Great fighter, and great listener. He has the ability to sense things in people, like when their lying or when their not who they say they are. Long Blue hair, and Extremely Athletic build. (Sophomore)

Lucas: 6th grader, with short blonde hair and a cowardly personality. A child genius he has been known to doing experiments with another boy, in the same grade as him with a near identical IQ level.

Luigi: Brother to the Schools most Popular kid. Short brown hair and a skinny body, he's a bit shy and cowardly compared to his star of a brother. (Junior)

Mario : Most popular kid in the school. Short brown hair and always seen wearing his blue overalls, he pretty much knows everyone in the school, even if he doesn’t associate with them. Pudgy build, he and his brother both have an innate ability to jump extremely high, although His brother’s jump is higher. (Junior)

Marth: A transfer student, from Japan. He is well known for his skill with a sword and his Bishie good looks. He is the rival to another student in the school, (Ike). Short blue hair, and an athletic body, he is part of the fencing team. (Senior)

Meta Knight: Mentor and primary challenger to Kirby, he’s a bit of a loner. He usually wears clothes that cover most of his body, so no one but a few people know what he really looks like, most people in the school think he’s just a myth actually. (Junior)

Mewtwo: Senior. He lives next door to you and is aware of your powers, he just doesn’t tell you or anyone. He’s also the School Psychiatrist/ Guidance Counselor helping kids out with their problems, although is problems outweigh all of theirs. Short white hair, and a Toned build.

Ness : Best friend to Lucas. Genius level IQ and a penchant for baseball. 6th Grader.

Peach : Girlfriend to Mario. Long Blonde hair, loves the color pink and is usually found with her parasol. She has a soft spoken voice and is well endowed.

Pichu : Younger Sister to Pikachu. Small Chest, loves wearing Yellow and black and is unusually quick for her size. She's the adventerous, Tomboy of the sisters loving to run around and be free. (Freshman)

Pikachu : Older Sister to Pichu. Long Gold hair, and pointy ears. She is usually always seen blushing, and is normally seen hanging around another student. (PokÃ©mon Trainer) She’s always wearing Black and Gold, and she’s been called 3 times as beautiful as her younger sister. She's the sweet, kind caring older sister of the two, more interested in romance than running around.(Junior)

Pit : Long brown hair and athletic body. Servant and has a crush on the Rock Star, Palutena. She lives in the town. Palutena has long green hair, and is about 30 years old, with fair skin. (Freshman)

PokÃ©mon Trainer: Short brown hair. Average build and a kind personality. He runs the Animal Adoption center in town, and can usually be found there if he’s not at the school. Has a crush on Pikachu but is to shy to tell her. (Junior)

R.O.B.: School Science/ Math Teacher. He’s a pretty calm calculating guy. Balding a bit, but usually wears a cap on his head, to hide it. He’s also the School’s Mascot the ‘Ancient Minister’.

Roy: Hot headed younger brother to Marth. Short red hair, and a hyper personality, he loves fighting and is petitioning to create a Fighting team for his school. He already has the Gym Teacher, The Track Teacher and Ike’s signatures for it. (Freshman)

Samus : The School’s head Gymnast. During Gym classes she wears a skin tight blue leotard, that exposes her body in all of it’s glory. When not doing strenuous activities though, she can usually be found wearing A red baggy hoodie and matching pants, pretty much hiding her body from the world. Long blonde hair and a defensive personality. (Sophomore)

Snake: Principal of the School. Ex Military Operative. Short brown hair, and a gruff voice, he is usually seen stalking around the school, hiding in boxes and barrels looking for trouble makers. Rumors say that he once snapped a kids neck.

Sonic : New kid to the school. Long blue spikey hair, and a ‘Go with it’ attitude. He’s probably the fastest kid in the school, and although he does show it off quite frequently, he never joined the track team, claiming it to be ‘No Challenge’.(Freshman)

Toon Link/Young Link: Link’s Younger brother, who idealizes his brother. Dresses like him, grunts like him, even acts like him. Has a crush on his brothers girlfriend, although she never acknowledges him. 6th Grader

Wario : Cousin to Mario. He has a problem with his cousin, usually pulling pranks on him, and messing with him, he once tried to kill him, but it didn’t work. (Junior)

Wolf: All Star Track Captain. Short grey hair, and a feral personality. Loves picking on Fox and Falco, whenever he sees them although, he’s extremely protective of them. (Senior)

Yoshi : Best friend to Mario and Luigi. Short stocky guy with green and red hair. Has about 30 brothers, all with different hair colors than him. Extremely loyal, and has a loving personality.

Zelda/Sheik: Girlfriend to Link. She’s a quiet girl, usually wearing long flowing dresses. She has silky blonde hair and eyes that could pierce someone’s soul .She’s an actress, and is usually seen playing characters with questionable genders.

Every Super Smash character has all of their abilities from the games. Fireballs, Fire Breath, Homing Attack, Super Farts, it’s just translated into their human forms, making it a bit more realistic. The Above mentioned Characters aren’t the only students in the school. All of the Assist Trophy characters are in the school, as are regular humans with no powers. The school has an even amount of Guys and Girls (400 a piece).

I reserve the right to delete any chapters that are not to my liking, or are not relevant to the plot. I don’t have to inform the author of the deletion, but I will most of the time, to be fair about it and give you a chance to edit. No One Liners... Seriously? Just don't do it those suck.
Please enjoy the story, and add as you see fit. Thank you ^_^.
